comments:
I20051214-1200

I could only reproduce this on GTK, not on Windows.

- Go to Help -> Search
- Search for "test"
- Bookmark any help item by clicking on the bookmark icon next to the search hit
- Switch to bookmarks page via the link at the bottom
- Right click on the bookmark, select Delete All
- Bug: An error has occured, see log for more details.

Here's the exception:

Assigning to Adam since it seems to be closely related to Bug 114627. I was not able to reproduce on RHEL5, maybe it is already fixed.

Could not reproduce on RH4 either.

There is no longer a bookmark button next to search hits as described in the bug description. I suspect the bug was specific to that button, though it's possible that my partial fix to bug 114627 that's already in HEAD did the trick.
